.class public auto ansi sealed StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler(sender As Object, sbdevent As StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs)
public delegate void StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs ^ sbdevent);
type StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler = delegate of obj * StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 대리자를 만들 때, 이벤트를 처리할 메서드를 식별합니다.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기와 연결하려면 대리자의 인스턴스를 해당 이벤트에 추가합니다.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 대리자를 제거하지 않는 경우 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출됩니다.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 이벤트 처리기 대리자에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)합니다.For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 속성에는 대리자는 클래스는 열거형 및 속성.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, the delegate, the class, the enumeration and the property. 예제를 실행 하는 폼에 다음 코드를 붙여넣습니다.To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 호출 된 `InitializeStatusBarPanels` 폼의 생성자 또는 이벤트 처리 메서드.Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#2)]
